short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Filters 'verified' videos from YouTube, putting unofficial (i.e. non-corporate) content back at the top of your searches.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tick Blocker puts the "you" back in YouTube by filtering content made by creators with the verified tick in front of their names, leaving only content from unverified (i.e. non-corporate and interesting) sources unharmed.

Tick Blocker transports you back to a time before the Internet was nerfed by corporate elite, where a kid with a 240p webcam had as big a voice as any billionaire media mogul.
